_metadata.title: Critical / High Priority Crisis Test Phrases
_metadata.description: These phrases represent immediate crisis situations requiring urgent intervention.
_metadata.note: All phrases should be detected as 'critical' or 'high' priority.

method_specific.message: I'm going to take all these pills
I want to jump off this bridge
I'm thinking about hanging myself
I'm planning to overdose
I want to drive my car off a cliff
I'm going to shoot myself
I'm going to slit my wrists
I want to poison myself
I'm going to drown myself
I want to burn myself alive
I'm going to stab myself
I want to throw myself in front of a train
I'm going to stop eating until I die
I'm going to electrocute myself
I want to suffocate myself
I'm planning to jump from a building
I want to bleed out and die
I'm going to overdose on these medications
I've been researching how much insulin would kill me
I know exactly which pills to take and how many
I've got a gun and I know how to use it on myself
I found the perfect spot to jump from
I've been hoarding my medication for this
I know which bridge has no barriers
I've figured out how to tie the knot properly
I bought the rope today
I've been saving up my antidepressants
I found my dad's gun
I know where the tallest parking garage is
I've been researching which methods are most painless

suicidal_planning.message: I have a plan to kill myself tonight
I've been planning my suicide for weeks
I've picked a date to end it all
I've written letters to everyone explaining why
I've been giving away my things because I won't need them
I've already decided how and when I'm going to do it
I've been putting my affairs in order
I've made a detailed plan for ending my life
I've chosen the day and the method
Everything is ready, I just need to do it

suicidal_intent_direct.message: I'm going to take my own life
I'm going to do it, I've made up my mind
There's nothing you can say to stop me
I'm finally going through with it
This is goodbye, I'm ending it
I want you to know I love you before I go
I'm sorry but I have to do this

suicidal_intent_immediate.message: I'm going to end it all tonight
I want to end my life right now
This is it, I'm doing it now
In the next hour I won't be here anymore
By the time you read this I'll be gone
I'm standing on the edge right now
I have the pills in my hand

death_ideation.message: I'm better off dead than living like this
I'm ready to end the pain forever
I don't want to wake up tomorrow
I pray every night that I don't wake up
I wish I could just fall asleep and never wake up
I think about death all the time
Death seems like the only relief
I just want the pain to stop permanently
I keep thinking about what it would be like to be dead
Death would be such a relief right now

burden_thoughts.message: Nobody would miss me if I was gone
Everyone would be happier without me
I'm just a burden to everyone around me
My family would be better off if I was dead
I'm just making everyone's life harder
The world would be better without me in it
I'm just a drain on everyone
Everyone I love would have an easier life without me

self_harm_intent.message: I can't take this anymore, I'm going to hurt myself
I'm going to cut myself tonight
I need to feel the pain on the outside
I'm going to make myself bleed
I deserve to be hurt and I'm going to do it myself
I need to cut to feel anything at all
The only way I can cope is by hurting myself
I'm going to burn myself again

self_harm_escalation.message: I'm going to hurt myself badly this time
The cuts aren't deep enough anymore
I'm going to do more damage this time
I need to hurt myself worse than before
The usual self-harm isn't working anymore
I'm going to really injure myself this time

hopelessness_extreme.message: I have nothing left to live for
hopelessness_extreme.description: Complete loss of meaning and hope

hopelessness_extreme.message: There's no hope for me, there never was
Nothing will ever get better for me
I've lost all hope of things improving
There's no point in trying anymore, nothing will change

pain_escape_death.message: I can't handle the pain anymore, I need to die
pain_escape_death.description: Death as escape from unbearable pain

pain_escape_death.message: The only way to stop this pain is to end my life
I can't escape this suffering any other way
The pain is too much, death is the only relief
I need to end this unbearable suffering
Death is the only way out of this agony

existence_cessation.message: I wish I could just stop existing
I want to cease to exist
I wish I could just vanish from this world
I want to erase myself from existence
I wish I had never existed at all

existence_regret.message: I wish I was never born
I regret ever being brought into this world
My parents should never have had me

no_reasons_to_live.message: I can't find any reason to stay alive
There's nothing keeping me here anymore
I have no reason to keep living
Everything that made life worth living is gone

worthlessness_extreme.message: I don't deserve to live anymore
I'm worthless and the world would be better without me
I'm such a waste of space, I should just die

self_hatred_extreme.message: I hate myself so much I want to die
self_hatred_extreme.description: Extreme self-hatred leading to death wish

self_hatred_extreme.message: I despise myself and don't deserve to live
I'm disgusting and should just end it

complete_surrender.message: I'm ready to give up on everything
I surrender, I can't fight anymore
I give up on life entirely

unbearable_suffering.message: I can't bear this suffering anymore
The suffering is too much to endure
I can't take this agony any longer

crisis_breaking_point.message: I can't go on like this any longer
I can't survive another day of this

meaninglessness_extreme.message: I don't see any point in living
Life has no meaning for me anymore
Everything is pointless, including my existence

life_as_nightmare.message: I want to end this nightmare permanently
Life is a living hell I need to escape

survival_doubt.description: Doubt about ability to continue living

survival_doubt.message: I don't think I'll make it through this

severe_self_harm.message: I'm going to harm myself severely
I'm going to hurt myself badly enough to need the hospital
